title: Xavier Booker Shows the Shoe Recruit Circuit Isn’t the Only Path
description: Xavier Booker, in an unusual move, is sidestepping the carnival of tournaments put on by shoe companies to showcase elite men’s basketball players.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:credit: Jacob Langston for The New York Times
media:description: Xavier Booker is not playing in any of July’s marquee recruiting events run by Nike, Adidas and Under Armour.
